about_the_game:
Being part of the Royal British Digital Society of Well-Mannered Gentlemen, Cynical Vinnie and Total Spike have donned their finest attire just to treat you to their deadly fish and chips. Huzzah!

This DLC contains a custom skin for Vinnie & Spike in Awesomenauts. You need to have Vinnie & Spike available as a playable character in order to access the skin in-game. Owning this skin will also unlock the special portrait for use in-game.
detailed_description:
Being part of the Royal British Digital Society of Well-Mannered Gentlemen, Cynical Vinnie and Total Spike have donned their finest attire just to treat you to their deadly fish and chips. Huzzah!

This DLC contains a custom skin for Vinnie & Spike in Awesomenauts. You need to have Vinnie & Spike available as a playable character in order to access the skin in-game. Owning this skin will also unlock the special portrait for use in-game.
legal_notice: © 2012-2014 Ronimo Games. Ronimo Games and Awesomenauts are trademarks or registered trademarks of Ronimo Games.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 1024MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX version 10.7 (Lion) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Lion 10.7 or later
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 1024MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
